text: Rough Cutt Live is a live album by the American heavy metal band Rough Cutt. The live album contains three new studio tracks. ==Track listing== #"Let 'em Talk" – 3:46 #"Bad Reputation" – 4:45 #"We Like It Loud" – 4:15 #"Double Trouble" – 3:22 #"Black Widow" – 4:44 #"Take Her" – 3:57 #"Dreamin' Again" – 5:27 #"Dressed to Kill" – 4:11 #"Cutt Your Heart Out" / "Rock the USA" – 2:27 #"Piece of My Heart" – 6:52 #"House of Pain" (studio track) – 4:15 #"Prowler" (studio track) – 6:03 #"Peyote" (studio track) – 6:47 ==Line–Up== *Paul Shortino – lead vocals *Amir Derakh – guitar *Chris Hager – guitar *Matt Thorr – bass *Dave Alford – drums ==References== Category:Rough Cutt albums Category:1996 live albums
title: Rough Cutt Live
